short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome Extension that automatically closes window tabs when you leave a meeting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Access the Google Meet website and start a meeting.
2. Click the end button on the Meet.
3. The tab will close automatically.
